Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To discover genes involved in von Hippel - Lindau ( VHL ) - mediated carcinogenesis , we used renal cell carcinoma cell lines stably transfected with wild - type VHL - expressing transgenes .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| von Hippel - Lindau |
| renal cell carcinoma |

The two disease entities in the paragraph are "von Hippel - Lindau" and "renal cell carcinoma".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| renal cell carcinoma |

The only clear disease entity in the paragraph is "renal cell carcinoma". The phrase "von Hippel - Lindau" refers to a genetic disorder, but it is not a disease itself, but rather a predisposition to various types of tumors.
